block.l: for (var idx = 0 ; idx < neighbors.length() ; idx ++) { var neighbor = neighbors.at(idx + 1); if(Math.abs(this.xPosition() - neighbor.xPosition()) < 25 && Math.abs(this.yPosition() - neighbor.yPosition()) < 25 && (neighbor.cloneOriginName === name || neighbor.name === name)) { return true; } } return false;
var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("GET", "/server/ping/" + collabsnap_activity + "/" + collabsnap_group, true); xhr.send();

if((world.collabsnapPolling == undefined || !world.collabsnapPolling) && world.collabsnapListeners != undefined && world.collabsnapListeners.length > 0) { world.collabsnapPolling = true; var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); if(world.queriesStr == undefined) { var queriesDoc = document.implementation.createDocument(null, "queries"); for(var idx = 0 ; idx < world.collabsnapListeners.length ; idx++) { var queryDoc = queriesDoc.createElement("query"); if(world.collabsnapListeners[idx].filter) { queriesDoc.documentElement.appendChild(queryDoc); queryDoc.appendChild(world.collabsnapListeners[idx].filter(queriesDoc)); } } world.queriesStr = new XMLSerializer().serializeToString(queriesDoc); } xhr.open("POST", "/server/poll/" + collabsnap_activity + "/" + collabsnap_group, true); xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-length", world.queriesStr.length); xhr.onreadystatechange = function () { world.collabsnapPolling = false; if(xhr.readyState === XMLHttpRequest.DONE && xhr.status === 200) { if (xhr.responseText == "false") { } else if(xhr.responseText == "ping") { window.alert("Ping sent to server, received here"); } else if (xhr.responseXML != null) { for(var idx = 0 ; idx < world.collabsnapListeners.length ; idx++) { var msg; var msgXML = xhr.responseXML.childNodes[0].childNodes[idx];; if(msgXML.nodeName == "null") { } else if(msgXML.nodeName == "message") { msg = msgXML; invoke(world.collabsnapListeners[idx].callback, new List([msg])); } else if (msgXML.nodeName == "sprite") { var ser = new SnapSerializer(); var ide_morph = world.children[0]; ser.project = ide_morph; var resp = new XMLSerializer().serializeToString(msgXML); msg = ser.loadValue(ser.parse(resp)); invoke(world.collabsnapListeners[idx].callback, new List([msg])); } else if(msgXML.nodeName == "variable") { invoke(world.collabsnapListeners[idx].callback, new List([msgXML.getAttribute("value")])); } } } } }; xhr.send(world.queriesStr); }

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "/server/postsprite/" + collabsnap_activity + "/" + collabsnap_group, true); xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-length", str.length); xhr.setRequestHeader("Connection", "close"); xhr.send(str);

var ide_morph = world.children[0]; ide_morph.sprites.add(sprite); ide_morph.corral.addSprite(sprite); sprite.allHatBlocksFor('__shout__go__').forEach( function(block) { ide_morph.stage.threads.startProcess(block); });

sprite.isClone = true; sprite.cloneOriginName = sprite.name; sprite.name = ""; var ide_morph = world.children[0]; sprite.allHatBlocksFor('__clone__init__').forEach( function (block) { ide_morph.stage.threads.startProcess(block); });
return function(xmlDoc) { var ele = xmlDoc.createElement("variable-equal"); ele.setAttribute("name", name); ele.setAttribute("value", value); return ele; }

// We stick this on world because it's there and this is a prototype. // We should change this in the future because world isn't under out control, // and may change out from underneath us if(world.collabsnapUniqueId == undefined) { // Ripped from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/105034/create-guid-uuid-in-javascript world.collabsnapUniqueId = 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx'.replace(/[xy]/g, function(c) { var r = Math.random()*16|0, v = c == 'x' ? r : (r&0x3|0x8); return v.toString(16); }); } return world.collabsnapUniqueId;

var xmlDoc = document.implementation.createDocument(null, "message"); var keyNode = xmlDoc.createElement("key"); var keyText = xmlDoc.createTextNode(k); keyNode.appendChild(keyText); var valNode = xmlDoc.createElement("val"); var valText = xmlDoc.createTextNode(v); valNode.appendChild(valText); xmlDoc.documentElement.appendChild(keyNode); xmlDoc.documentElement.appendChild(valNode); return xmlDoc;
return function(xmlDoc) { var ele = xmlDoc.createElement("message-key"); ele.setAttribute("key", key);; return ele; }

if(world.collabsnapListeners == undefined) { world.collabsnapListeners = []; } var listenerId = false; for(var idx = 0 ; idx < world.collabsnapListeners.length ; idx++) { if(world.collabsnapListeners[idx].filter.toString() == filter.toString() && world.collabsnapListeners[idx].callback.toString() == handler.toString()) { listenerId = world.collabsnapListeners[idx].listenerId; } } if(!listenerId) { // Ripped from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/105034/create-guid-uuid-in-javascript listenerId = 'xxxxxxxx'.replace(/[xy]/g, function(c) { var r = Math.random()*16|0, v = c == 'x' ? r : (r&0x3|0x8); return v.toString(16); }); world.collabsnapListeners.push({ "filter": filter, "callback": handler, "listenerId": listenerId}); world.queriesStr = undefined; } return listenerId

if(world.collabsnapListeners != undefined) { for (var idx = 0 ; idx < world.collabsnapListeners.length ; idx++) { if(world.collabsnapListeners[idx].listenerId == listenerId) { world.collabsnapListeners.splice(idx, 1); break; } } }

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("GET", "/server/variable/" + collabsnap_activity + "/" + collabsnap_group + "?variable=" + name + "&action=set&value=" + val, true); xhr.setRequestHeader("Connection", "close"); xhr.send();
return function(xmlDoc) { var ele = xmlDoc.createElement("get-variable"); ele.setAttribute("name", name); return ele; }

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("GET", "/server/variable/" + collabsnap_activity + "/" + collabsnap_group + "?variable=" + name + "&action=increment", true); xhr.setRequestHeader("Connection", "close"); xhr.send();

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("GET", "/server/variable/" + collabsnap_activity + "/" + collabsnap_group + "?variable=" + name + "&action=decrement", true); xhr.setRequestHeader("Connection", "close"); xhr.send();
